Yea, there's difficult.  I spent about 2 hours trying to beat "The 
Brag".   The opponent archers kept killing one of my team members with 
a single exploding bolt, despite the 3 map tile wide walls. [I knew I 
should have started earlier in the Tevfifty devoting my earnings 
sololy to strength, intelligence, and armor for my team members 
before getting to my own set.]  It ain't fun when a member of your 
team can be killed with a single blow.

I may undertake the project of renovating scenario #122 just to add 
more space between the rows of trees so that the golems stay in place. 
 Literally, currently there are 4 vertical map tiles and 4 
horizontal map tiles separating each row.  Any ideas on how much more 
space to add between the rows of trees just to ease the crowded 
golems?
